snippet: In a unanimous decision, the California Supreme Court ruled that employers do not have to make sure that workers takes state-mandated breaks.
lead_paragraph: In a unanimous decision, the California Supreme Court ruled that employers do not have to make sure that workers takes state-mandated breaks.

headline.seo: California Court Sides With Businesses on Worker Breaks
headline.main: California Court Sides With Businesses on Worker Breaks
headline.print_headline: California Court Sides With Businesses on Worker Breaks
